Content: IP legal fees might be another one to lead revenue.

Author: jdavid
Content: VC money, gives you capitol weight, and if you wanted to negotiate partner relationships as part of your business plan, the VC $$ will help demonstrate that you can execute.  If you are working on an app, that requires page views only, then you might be able to cost through on your own; but if you are building an app with a new model, you will need some time time to tweak things for your customer/ partner relationships before the dollars roll in.

Author: ph0rque
Content: Working 70-75 hrs/wk is just not sustainable over the long term, you will get burned out, fired from your day job, and won't want to continue working on your project.
